feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-08-24T09:54:09.330043Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;早期宇宙中的宇宙时间膨胀</stitle>; <id>;https://www.advancedsciencenews.com/time-ran-slowly-in-the-early-universe-just -as-einstein-predicted/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T02:53:56.783564Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.advancedsciencenews.com/time-ran-slowly-in -the-early-universe-just-as-einstein-predicted/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;geox</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=geox</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.advancedsciencenews.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/daniele-levis-pelusi-rmM8V7L1BhM-unsplash.jpg"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 123px;" />;<br />;科学家发现，大爆炸后时间的流逝速度慢了五倍，证实了爱因斯坦的预测。研究人员利用类星体作为宇宙钟，观察到了早期宇宙的时间膨胀，表明时间是相对的到宇宙的年龄。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cosmological-time-dilation-in-the-early-universe" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37214693" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;JVM 内部：数组</stitle>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;荷兰电动自行车制造商 VanMoof 破产，骑手陷入困境</stitle>; <id>;https://www.npr.org/2023/08/23/1195201692/vanmoof-ebikes-bankrupt-netherlands< /id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T08:53:56.784639Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.npr.org/2023/08/23/1195201692/vanmoof-ebikes-bankrupt-netherlands "/>; <author>; <name>;isaacfrond</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=isaacfrond</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://media.npr.org/assets/img/2023/08/22/2023-08-17t230237z_596785509_rc2rp2aux1l1_rtrmadp_3_vanmoof-ma-mclarenapplied_slide-e0a3a0b798e13428153d7329a3cd4bc52 1b51b24-s1100-c50.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;以时尚设计和易用性而闻名的荷兰电动自行车制造商 VanMoof 已经破产。客户现在陷入困境，得不到支持或维修。 <a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dutch-e-bike-maker-vanmoof-goes-bankrupt-leaving-riders-stranded" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37246195" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Windows 2.0 的历史</stitle>; <id>;https://www.abortretry.fail/p/the-history-of-windows-20< /id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T22:53:56.785069Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.abortretry.fail/p/the-history-of-windows-20"/>; <作者>; <name>;jnord</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jnord</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F259e9ceb-cad8 -4302-9db8-b6e22abd1ac2_640x350.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 121px;" />;<br />;Windows 1.0 发布后，Tandy Trower 用了 18 个月的时间开发 Windows 2.0。他添加了重叠窗口和比例系统字体等功能。Windows 2.0 于 1987 年发布，并得到了改进UI 和硬件支持。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-history-of-windows-2-0" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37216455" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Pytudes</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/norvig/pytudes</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T20 ：53：56.785491Z </更新>; <link href =“https://github.com/norvig/pytudes”/>; <作者>; <名称>;sonabinu </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=sonabinu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/8b72c4a4686ce60f31f2c378093e5382bcd953e3510cdb6510b33a8877acb39a/68747470733a2f2f696d 616765732d6e612e73736c2d696d616765732d616d617a6f6e2e636f6d2f696d616765732f492f35315a6e5a48323964764c2e5f53583339345f424f312 c3230342c3230332c3230305f2e6a7067”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 278px;" />;<br />;练习曲是一种器乐作品，旨在为完善特定的音乐技能提供练习材料。有些人想到像 Spotify 这样的编程，他们想知道如何安装该应用程序，找到一个好的播放列表，然后点击播放按钮；之后，他们就不想再考虑它了。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pytudes" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37241625" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;关于保存素描本</stitle>; <id>;https://attainablefelicity.mattkirkland.com/20230822/Sketchbooks.html </id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T19:53:56.786327Z</更新>; <link href="https://attainablefelicity.mattkirkland.com/20230822/Sketchbooks.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>; matt_kirkland</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=matt_kirkland</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://attainablefelicity. mattkirkland.com/assets/2023sketchbooks/stack.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 208px;" />;<br />;我从 2000 年开始就一直保留一本素描本。它已经成为我更好地处理和记忆事物的笔记本。它帮助我思考、计划和改进我的想法。<a href= “https://hackernews.betacat.io/#on-keeping-sketchbooks” target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 37227606" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;《对抗者：输入文字游戏的兴衰》</stitle>; <id>;https://if50.substack.com/p/the-antagonists</id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T03 :53:56.786773Z</updated>; <link href="https://if50.substack.com/p/the-antagonists"/>; <作者>; <name>;JohnHammersley</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=JohnHammersley</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto, q_auto:好，fl_progressive:陡峭/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F83f94638-30e4-4ff7-a4e9-578e306b69b7_946x1358.png" style="width: 220px; height: 316px;" />;<br />;《The Antagonists》是一本出版于 1985 年的书籍和电脑游戏组合。它包含了来自虚构世界的一系列文档和细节，以及一个只有在彻底了解之后才能完成的游戏。理解世界。这本书是由阿尔伯特·伦肖 (Albert Renshaw) 策划的文档集，他是地球上最后一个被巨型植物和巨大昆虫征服的人类幸存者。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the -antagonists-the-rise-and-fall-of-type-in​​-text-games" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=37216412" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;显示 HN：自动化复杂的手动业务流程</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tooljet.com/workflows</id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T05:53:56.787191Z< /updated>; <link href="https://www.tooljet.com/workflows"/>; <作者>; <name>;mrjn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= mrjn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/6266634263b9179f76b2236e/64d4aded25085728596d74e8_sendss.png" style="width: 220px; height: 125px;" />;<br />;以更少的工程工作量自动化复杂的手动业务流程。利用我们的企业级工作流构建器实现更好的业务成果。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show- hn-automate-complicated-manual-business-processes" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37245171" target="_blank ">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Bun v0.1 8</stitle>; <id>;https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v0.8.0</id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T01:53:56.787614Z</更新>; <link href="https ://bun.sh/blog/bun-v0.8.0"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://github-production-user-asset-6210df.s3.amazonaws.com/3084745/261513717-3b69c7e9-25ff-4f9d-acc4-caa736862935 .png"样式="宽度：220px； height: 125px;" />;<br />;Bun v0.8.0 添加了调试器支持，实现了获取流，并解锁了 SvelteKit。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bun-v0-8" target ="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37244012" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Dataherald AI – 自然语言到 SQL 引擎</stitle>; < id>;https://github.com/Dataherald/dataherald</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T18:53:56.788032Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/Dataherald/dataherald "/>; <author>; <name>;aazo11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aazo11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://opengraph.githubassets.com/86d198e2c46041f3f7c5c5307c86e169534f40104c6d8682e17188a6266d85fa/Dataherald/dataherald”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Dataherald 是一种自然语言到 SQL 的引擎，专为针对结构化数据进行企业级问答而构建。它允许您从数据库设置一个 API，该 API 可以用简单的英语回答问题. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-dataherald-ai-natural-language-to-sql-engine" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37240363" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;反对自动性</stitle>; <id>;https://carcinising.com/2023/08/22/against-automaticity/</id >; <更新>;2023-08-23T20:53:56.788446Z</更新>; <link href="https://carcinising.com/2023/08/22/against-automaticity/"/>; <作者>; <名称>; simonsarris</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=simonsarris</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://carcinitation. files.wordpress.com/2023/08/image.png?w=906" style="width: 220px; height: 228px;" />;<br />;广告以两种无聊的方式发挥作用，提醒顾客产品的存在，并以更心理的方式，在产品和积极情绪之间建立联系。理性主义社区挑战自动性的想法，并认为：人类行为比以前认为的更加理性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#against-automaticity" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37226879" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;英国核潜艇上的生活（2012）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/uk/2012/aug/21/life -on-board-nuclear-submarine</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T20:53:56.788859Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/uk/2012/aug/ 21/life-on-board-nuclear-submarine"/>; <author>; <name>;whocansay</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=whocansay</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/static/sys-images/Guardian/About/General/2012/8/21/1345564538828/HMS-凯旋-cramped-cond-010.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="width: 220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;描述了英国核潜艇上的生活，以及执行官和船员的见解。文章强调了对新人的实际指导、船员之间的友情和责任与船上操作核反应堆有关。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#life-on-board-a-british-nuclear-submarine-2012" target="_blank">;[summary] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37241601" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人工智能实时人体全身照片生成器</stitle>; <id>;https:// generated.photos / human-generator / </ id>; <更新>; 2023-08-23T15：53：56.789271Z </更新>; <link href =“https:// generated.photos/ human-generator/”/>; <作者>; <名称>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// static. generated.photos/vue-static/ human-generator/opengraph.png" style="width: 220px; height: 115px;" />;<br />;利用AI在线生成不存在的人物，更换服装并修改面部和身体特征。下载生成的不同姿势的人物。 <a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#ai-real-time- human-full-body-photo-generator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=37237583" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;Nvidia 公布 2024 财年第二季度财务业绩</stitle>; <id>;https://nvidianews.nvidia.com/news/nvidia-announces-financial-results-for-second-quarter-fiscal- 2024</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T20:53:56.789684Z</更新>; <link href="https://nvidianews.nvidia.com/news/nvidia-announces-financial-results-for-second -quarter-fiscal-2024"/>; <作者>; <名称>;electriclove</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=electriclove</uri>; </author>; <内容类型= “html”>;<img src =“https://www.nvidia.com/content/dam/en-zz/Solutions/navigation/intelligent-machines.png”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 125px;" />;<br />;NVIDIA公布第二季度营收为135.1亿美元，同比增长101%。该公司还宣布了在人工智能和游戏领域的合作伙伴关系和新产品。 <a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nvidia-announces-financial-results-for-second-quarter-fiscal-2024" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37241487" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;最简单的步行机器人：具有 1 个执行器和 2 个刚体的双足机器人</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2308.08401</id >; <更新>;2023-08-23T23:53:56.790100Z</更新>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2308.08401"/>; <作者>; <名称>;PaulHoule</名称>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse /0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;我们展示了第一个 1-DOF、髋部驱动双足机器人的设计和实验结果。我们的设计仅使用由单个电机连接的两个刚体，旨在实现步行探索尺寸较小，无法构造更复杂的设计。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-simplest-walking-robot-a-bipedal-robot-with-1-actuator-and-2-刚体" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37215331" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;威尔士语是科学语言</stitle>; < id>;https://www.cardiff.ac.uk/news/view/2733589-welsh-is-a-language-for-science</id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T01:53:56.791373Z</已更新>; <link href="https://www.cardiff.ac.uk/news/view/2733589-welsh-is-a-language-for-science"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Tomte</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cardiff.imgix.net/__data /assets/image/0006/2733720/Owain-Beynon.jpg?w=873&h=491&fit=crop&q=60&auto=format" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;来自卡马森的博士生 Owain Beynon 将成为卡迪夫大学历史上第一个完全用威尔士语完成化学博士学位的人。他认为，表明威尔士语是一个非常重要的学科。科学语言。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#welsh-is-a-language-for-science" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37214408" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;基于 Spotify 播放列表的编程语言的解释器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/h313/spet</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T19:53:56.791785Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/h313/spet"/>; <author>; <name>;pyinstallwoes</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pyinstallwoes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/f3c58e2bfa4da290538a73694d800f0ea73e71ddd172a2b1af87abcccb46bc99/h313/spet"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 110px;" />;<br />;Spet 是基于 Spotify 播放列表的编程语言的解释器。它从上到下读取播放列表，并使用歌曲的各种属性来定义行为。该解释器需要 Spotify 高级帐户连接 API。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-interpreter-for-a-programming-language-based-on-spotify-playlists" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37231347" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;家乐氏将就墨西哥的营养标签规则展开战争</stitle>; <id>;https://www. statnews.com/2023/08/21/kelloggs-mexico-nutrition-label/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T06:53:56.792197Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.statnews.com/2023/08/21/kelloggs-mexico-nutrition-label/</id>; statnews.com/2023/08/21/kelloggs-mexico-nutrition-label/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;thunderbong</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.statnews.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/MEXICO_Keloggs_v2-645x645.jpg" style="宽度：220px； height: 220px;" />;<br />;家乐氏正在墨西哥就该国的营养标签规定发起一场战争。该公司已就墨西哥政府要求在不健康食品上贴上警告标签以及禁止在带有警告标签的包装上使用吉祥物的政策起诉了墨西哥政府.<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kelloggs-is-going-to-war-over-mexicos-nutrition-label-rules" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37245593" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Print(“lol”) 使我的 Go 函数速度提高了一倍</stitle>; <id>;https://medium.com/ @ludirehak/printing-lol-doubled-the-speed-of-my-go-code-e32e02fc3f92</id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T02:53:56.792615Z</更新>; <link href="https: //medium.com/@ludirehak/printing-lol-doubled-the-speed-of-my-go-code-e32e02fc3f92"/>; <author>; <name>;ludiludi</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=ludiludi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1358/1 *nAyhwGzJghFJRfFm5pykYA.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 204px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了在 Go 函数中添加 print 语句的影响以及它如何影响分支预测。它表明分支预测有效地去除了 if 语句并提高了性能。<a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#print-lol-doubled-the-speed-of-my-go-function" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37244503" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PreTeXt：一次编写，随处阅读的创作和发布系统</stitle>; <id>;https://pretextbook.org/</id>; <更新>;2023- 08-23T19:53:56.793035Z</updated>; <link href="https://pretextbook.org/"/>; <作者>; <name>;teleforce</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=teleforce</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://pretextbook.org/images/runestone_logo_small.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;PreTeXt 是一个为教科书、研究文章和专着作者（特别是 STEM 学科）的作者提供的创作和出版系统。它提供了一系列功能并支持不同的主题。该系统具有全面的文档以及针对作者、出版商、读者和开发人员的支持论坛。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pretext-write-once-read-anywhere-authoring-and-publishing-system" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37231025" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;计数的早期历史</stitle>; <id>;https://www .laphamsquarterly.org/roundtable/early-history-counting</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T19:53:56.793447Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/roundtable/早期历史计数"/>; <作者>; <名称>;anarbadalov </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anarbadalov</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/sites/default/files/images/roundtable/counting_lead_v1.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：269px;" />;<br />;弄清楚人类何时开始有目的地系统地计数并不容易。我们第一个真正的线索是一些奇怪的雕刻骨头，可以追溯到三千年的最后几千年-​旧石器时代或旧石器时代的百万年范围。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-early-history-of-counting" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37240681" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;具有 32k 上下文长度的开源 LLM</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.abacus.ai/ blog/2023/08/22/giraffe-long-context-llms/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-24T05:53:56.793856Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.abacus. ai/blog/2023/08/22/giraffe-long-context-llms/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;shubham_saboo</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=shubham_saboo </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/blog.abacus.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/image-new -3-1.jpg?resize=1140%2C694&ssl=1" style="宽度:220px; height: 134px;" />;<br />;Giraffe 是一个新的模型系列，是在基础 LLaMA 和 LLaMA2 的基础上进行微调的。本文探讨了大型语言模型 (LLM) 的上下文长度外推主题。<a href="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/#open-source-llm-with-32k-context-length" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=37245473" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;HashiCorp 切换到 BSL 显示了对开放特许公司的需求</stitle>; <id>;https://opencoreventures.com/blog/2023-08-23-hashicorp-switching-bsl-shows -need-for-open-charter-companies/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T18:53:56.794262Z</更新>; <link href="https://opencoreventures.com/blog/2023-08 -23-hashicorp-switching-bsl-shows-need-for-open-charter-companies/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sytse</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=sytse</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opencoreventures.com/blog/2023-08-23-hashicorp-switching-bsl-shows-need- for-open-charter-companies/avg-time-ipo-switch.png" style="width: 220px; height: 137px;" />;<br />;HashiCorp 是最新一家从开源转向非竞争许可证的公司，追随知名开源公司的趋势。这种趋势引起了对商业开源软件的不信任社区呼吁公司通过开放章程承担责任。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hashicorp-switching-to-bsl-shows-a-need-for-open- Charter-companies" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37239979" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SeaGlass：全市 IMSI-Catcher 检测（2017 年） ）</stitle>; <id>;https://seaglass.cs.washington.edu/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T16:53:56.794690Z</更新>; <link href="https:// seaglass.cs.washington.edu/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;karlzt </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=karlzt </uri>; </作者>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://seaglass-web.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/sensor_triplet.png”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 188px;" />;<br />;SeaGlass 是一个旨在测量整个城市 IMSI 捕获器使用情况的系统。它收集手机信号塔信号数据来检测 IMSI 捕获器签名。<a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#seaglass-city-wide-imsi-catcher-detection-2017" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =37238254" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= “text">;第一个符合标准的 M1 GPU 驱动程序</stitle>; <id>;https://rosenzweig.io/blog/first-conformant-m1-gpu-driver.html</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T09 :53:56.795174Z</updated>; <link href="https://rosenzweig.io/blog/first-conformant-m1-gpu-driver.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti </名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://rosenzweig.io/blog/vkinstancing2. webp"样式="宽度：220px； height: 119px;" />;<br />;符合 OpenGL ES 3.1 的驱动程序现已适用于 M1 和 M2 系列 GPU。我们的逆向工程、免费和开源图形驱动程序是世界上唯一适用于 M1 的符合 OpenGL ES 3.1 实现- 和 M2 系列图形硬件。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-first-conformant-m1-gpu-driver" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37224042" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Chandrayaan-3 软着陆[视频]</stitle>;
